Result 14 - Family of Lines
L1+λL2=0L1 + λL2 =0L1+λL2=0﻿
1.
Family of Lines is a collection of lines having common geometrical condition. ex. 1 Lines having slope 2 ex2. Lines passing through origin
2.
Q1: Find equation of strait line passing through the intersection point of L1 : 3x-4y+6=0 & L2: x+y+2=0 & satisfies
1) passes through (3,1)
2) Perpendicular to 3x-4y+6=0
3) Has equal intercept on L1 L2
4) At a distance of 5 units from O (0,0)
5) Is concurrent with Lines x-y+1=0 & 2x+y-2=0
